text:
for those people using CUDA.jl with Julia tasks/threads: now would be a good time to test or comment on <https://github.com/JuliaGPU/CUDA.jl/pull/662>
TL;DR: per-task streams and synchronization, which makes it possible to overlap GPU computations of individual tasks.

text: This probably won't have an effect on <https://github.com/JuliaGPU/CUDA.jl/issues/595>, right? (Not able to test the PR branch myself right now, sorry.)
